sentences.sContent: Many students have a free overdraft facility (= agreement with their bank to have an overdraft up to a particular limit ).
sentences.sCn: 许多学生都能享受免费透支服务。

trans.tranCn: [金融] 透支；[金融] 透支额
trans.tranOther: the amount of money you owe to a bank when you have spent more money than you had in your account
